This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS context.addHitRegion() 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : '' }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : undefined }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ control : {} }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ control : null }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ control : undefined }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : '', control : {} }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : undefined, control : {} }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : '', control : null }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : undefined, control : null }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : '', control : undefined }) 
PASS context.addHitRegion({ id : undefined, control : undefined ) 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
